phase.name: phase
phase.description: Clinical development stage of the drug

status.name: status
status.description: Clinical trial status for the drug/indication pair

urls.name: urls
urls.description: List of web addresses that support the drug/indication pair

niceName.name: niceName
niceName.description: List of human readable names for the reference source

url.name: url
url.description: List of web addresses that support the drug/indication pair

ancestors.name: ancestors
ancestors.description: List of parent disease terms of the condition being treated

label.name: label
label.description: Disease label for the condition being treated

approvedSymbol.name: approvedSymbol
approvedSymbol.description: Approved gene symbol of the target modulated by the drug

approvedName.name: approvedName
approvedName.description: Approved full name of the gene or gene product modulated by the drug

targetClass.name: targetClass
targetClass.description: Classification category of the drug's biological target (e.g. Enzyme)

prefName.name: prefName
prefName.description: Commonly used name for the drug

tradeNames.name: tradeNames
tradeNames.description: List of brand names for the drug

synonyms.name: synonyms
synonyms.description: List of alternative names to refer to the drug

drugType.name: drugType
drugType.description: Classification of the modality of the drug (e.g. Small molecule)

targetName.name: targetName
targetName.description: Full name of the gene or gene product modulated by the drug, as referred by ChEMBL
